showScoreExcerpt:
Lloyd Webber’s least original musical….
it’s the sort of show that an undemanding theatergoer, or one in the right mood for it, might find fun. I didn’t find it much fun. I wasn’t horrified, just disappointed. Disappointed by the tunes, from a composer who has delivered distinctly memorable songs over the past half century. Disappointed that the book makes no sense
